amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the collection of certain communications under section 702 of FISA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to limit the warrantless collection of American's communications under section 702 of FISA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A098) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 253 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A098) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 253 (Roll no. 345).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A098) offered by Mr. Amash.
